title: WhatsApp Chat Widget
description: Created a <1>widget generator</1> for Saysimple that lets businesses add a custom WhatsApp <1>entry point</1> to their site in just minutes.

modal.title: WhatsApp Chat Widget Generator
modal.intro: I built a <1>WhatsApp chat widget generator</1> for <1>Saysimple’s website</1> using <1>React</1> and <1>Redux</1>. The tool outputs a tiny <1>Svelte embed</1>, chosen over heavier libraries to keep performance snappy. Businesses simply copy-paste the snippet into their site to offer a branded, configurable way for customers to start a WhatsApp conversation.

features.title: Key Features
list: Built with <1>React</1> and <1>Redux</1>, outputs a <1>Svelte embed</1> for minimal bundle size

impact.title: Impact
impact.text: This generator makes it easy for businesses to publish a WhatsApp entry point <1>without technical overhead</1>. The lightweight embed loads instantly and hands off directly to WhatsApp, lowering friction and <1>driving more conversations</1>. Alongside it, I also developed a <1>pricing calculator</1> that adds <1>another interactive touchpoint</1> to Saysimple’s website.
